title: The Scenic Lookout with the Broken Fence

infobox.Title:: The Scenic Lookout with the Broken Fence
infobox.Japanese title:: 壊れた柵の展望台  (Kowareta Saku no Tenbōdai)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Ran Mouri
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Junko Yamanaka and Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Dai Matsumoto as Takaya Hirai  Masashi Sugawara as Eiichiro Kondo  Isshin Chiba as Police officer  Takeharu Onishi as Paramedic

sections.Situation: Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are on a hiking trip in Nishitama. When they reach the Mt. Kotengu observation deck, they witness a man jump off the edge to his death. The body was found at the bottom of the hill and is identified to be Takaya Hirai.
sections.People:
- Victim (fell)
- 29 years old
- Mt. Kotengu park maintenance
- 39 years old
- Mt. Kotengu park maintenance
- Nishitama police officer
- Nishitama police paramedic
- Deceased (fell)
- Mt. Kotengu park maintenance
sections.Resolution: Kondo confesses and reveals that Hirai was blackmailing him after he accidentally caused the death of a co-worker. The accident occurred as they were arguing with Hirai who was illegally selling wildlife plants to young tourists. They were arguing on the edge of a cliff, when their female co-worker tried to calm them down he accidentally shoved causing her to fall from the cliff to her death.
sections.Trivia: - The Nishi Tokyo Bus B001 from Shin Hachioji Station to Mt. Kotengu is the same in The Tenth Passenger. The license plate number is 西多摩 22 • か 23-79 (Nishitama 22 • Ka 23-79).
